title: Wat
body: So uhhh. Just checked my client. This message appeared. I didnt open any programs or anything. I was just afk, and when I came back this was there. What does it mean?

replies.body:
*Maestro* is the service that keeps track of where you are in the client and reports your status to the servers. When you disconnect from this service, it's typically an indication that there are problems along your route to the Maestro servers. Local network settings are by far the biggest culprit of these issues, so check out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some common solutions.

Let me know if you have any other issues with this.
